question_stem:
In the topic on One-Way ANOVA, we worked with the heifers dataset. The following is the SAS output.
The value of 0.0148 corresponds to ∑i=1k∑j=1ni(Yij−Y¯¯)2 where Y¯¯ corresponds to the overall mean of all observations.
